definition: to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense
row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column
to decide and act alone (idiom); to take arbitrary action/a law unto oneself
to go one's own way (idiom); to act independently without asking others

sentences.english: Like living in the mountains from the solitary who had every day.
sentences.chinese: 像躲避在深山老林居住的独行者过每天。

sentences.english: Colleen was a loner, except for her sister’s company.
sentences.chinese: 除了和妹妹做伴之外，科琳是个独行侠。

sentences.english: I am alone and the road is very dark.
sentences.chinese: 我踽踽独行，前路一片漆黑。

sentences.english: Therefore they shall eat the fruit of their own way, and shall be filled with their own devices.
sentences.chinese: 所以他们必要自食其果，饱尝独断独行的滋味。

sentences.english: To many Chinese, "Chinas number one sister" is a maverick.
sentences.chinese: 对许多中国人而言，“中国一姐”是一名特立独行者。

sentences.english: Klinsi, you will never walk alone!
sentences.chinese: 克林斯曼，你永远不会独行。

sentences.english: To many Chinese, "China's number one sister" is a maverick.
sentences.chinese: 对许多中国人而言，“中国一姐”是一位特立独行者。

sentences.english: In the struggle to heal this nation and repair this world, we cannot walk alone.
sentences.chinese: 在完善改良我们国家的道路上，我们不能踽踽独行。

sentences.english: They dare not break the herd, afraid of the ridicule of their neighbours.
sentences.chinese: 他们怕邻居讥笑，不敢独断独行。

sentences.english: But Abaddon was always one apart.
sentences.chinese: 但是亚巴顿总是特立独行。

sentences.english: This made him something of a loner, but he didn't mind.
sentences.chinese: 兰波成了一个独行客，不过他并不在意。

sentences.english: Nevertheless you are in a self-assertive mood today.
sentences.chinese: 今天你的情绪会比较独断独行。

sentences.english: Mrrr? Very well, if you must. Fare you well, Walks the Night Alone.
sentences.chinese: 喵？好吧，如果你非走不可。再会啰，夜间独行客。

sentences.english: Romance is a snowy evening you walk back home alone with creaking footsteps.
sentences.chinese: 浪漫是飞雪的黄昏踏雪而归踽踽独行。

sentences.english: The mechanism of salt tolerance and universal stress resistance in Lepidium latifolium.
sentences.chinese: 大叶独行菜耐盐及广谱抗逆性的基础机理研究。

definition: coming and going alone (idiom); a lone operator/keeping to oneself/unsociable/maverick
lit. a lonely body with only a shadow for company/to be all alone (idiom)
